items.sentence: Tom didn\'t say anything about what he had done.
Tom wanted to know more about Mary\'s boyfriend.
Last night there was a fire in the neighborhood.
Everyone is hoping that nothing bad will happen.
Tom is the type of person who likes to complain.
Tom is unwilling to help Mary with her homework.
Tom is upset because Mary has been ignoring him.
Did Tom know that he was doing it the wrong way?
Did Tom say it was necessary for him to do that?
There isn\'t much I can do to help, I\'m afraid.
